Text: EnronOnline Content for Web Cc attached market information for European Continental Gas Best Regards Suryan

Re Content Definition Frameworkv Document Cc Please find attached the items that remained outstanding I have also completed the remaining information in the table This was Credit Contacts Numbers Credit Products Bankrupcy Swaps Digital Payout Credit Quotes Lockhead Martin Corporation Vodaphone Airtouch plc Intel Corporation Here the summary The CD with the voice over will be sent to Kal Shah as soon as we get Thors voice recorded As for the weather information Victoria could you please chase up the desk in Houston as Thor needs this information to do the European version Thanks Outstanding Desks At this stage there is a possibility that Global Coal may want to add a few products but that will not be known until tomorrow Let me know if you are missing anything but presumably you now have everything besides the weather info Best Regards Suryan

EnronOnline European Contentfind attached last Thursdays European information to be posted on Enrononline Forwarded by Suryan Wirya SimunovicLONECT on Suryan Wirya Simunovic To Jon Gilchrist ENRON cc ENRON Bob Shults ENRON ENRON Nick Mooney ENRON Subject EnronOnline European Content Jon Here are more content files from the European Desks I have also attached a summary sheet with all the information you should have received from us marked in Green We still have some stragglers but they should submit by Friday our closing I understand Victoria already sent you most of the weather information earlier in the week If you have any question please let me know Regards Suryan

Sea Freight Launch Flyer Cc previous email International Sea Freight wants to launch new products on August st Would appreciate your approval recommended changes of the attached flyer Thank You Suryan Forwarded by Suryan Wirya SimunovicLONECT on From Helena Jarabakova To Suryan Wirya CT cc Subject latest ill be down in a sec
